footer.text-1: Smart solution - enjoy and experience the technology life in your ways.

home.text-1: Smart solution - enjoy and experience the technology life in your ways.
home.text-2: Dive into the world of Digital to Accelerate the transition to the next generation of technology!

text-4.main: We deliver the satisfying, high-impact results that are only possible thanks to our values

text-5.title: Our services
text-5.subtitle: Consultancy, Rapid creation of a digital experience.

item-1.title: Applications Development
item-1.description: With an integrated approach, we develop customized web, mobile and platform applications.

item-2.title: Conception and Design
item-2.description: Responsive UI/UX design of ergonomic web and mobile user interfaces with an intuitive user experience.

item-3.title: Data Engineering
item-3.description: Data processing and analysis; Following the adequate standard, we process and add value to data for efficient exploitation.

item-4.title: Cloud Deployment
item-4.description: With our beneficial advice on choosing from the full range of cloud providers, we help customers to put their solutions on the cloud in order to benefit from related services.

item-5.title: APIs development
item-5.description: With our expertise in several technologies (Python, JavaScript, .Net, Java, etc.), we design and implement APIs tailored to our customers needs.

item-6.title: Integrations
item-6.description: Integration of solutions in different blocks to form a single solution.

text-6.two: Tell us about the project you'd like to work on with us, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours!

text-7.title: Our product range
text-7.subtitle: We offer digital products that impact the daily life of society....

item-1.title: MASOMO
item-1.description: A digital school, accessible anywhere, anytime.

item-2.title: SHOP
item-2.description: ERP, a multi-module management platform for small and medium-sized organizations.

item-3.title: AFYA
item-3.description: A platform for managing medical records, monitoring and controlling your state of health.

text-8.title: About us
text-8.description: We are an organization committed to using technology as a powerful tool to support society in its daily life and make certain tasks much easier!
text-8.subtitle: We are

text-9.title: It's also an Artificial Intelligence laboratory...
text-9.description: We use data to develop intelligent tools that benefit the industry...
text-9.subtitle: AI for society!

text-11.title: Contactez-nous
text-11.subtitle: 24heure/24, Notre équipe d'assistance est disponible et prête à vous répondre.

text-12.title: What people are saying about us!
text-12.description: Thank you Afik Foundation for the commendable service you have provided in digitizing our work.
